## Overview

What is genomic data, how can one analyse it and why is it important? The purpose of this topic is to introduce you to genomic data and explain how its analysis enables personalised treatment and prevention of disease.

## DNA Data: Sequencing and Modelling

Watch the following 4 videos to find out what DNA data looks like, and how it is sequenced, modelled and analysed.
